summary: TAKATA RECALL -  I RECEIVED NOTICE THAT MY CAR MAY HAVE A DANGEROUS DEFECT THAT COULD CAUSE SERIOUS INJURY.  I'M NOT ABLE TO LOCATE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION ABOUT THIS SITUATION ON YOUR WEBSITE EVEN THOUGH I PUT MY VIN NUMBER IN TO HAVE MY VEHICLE SEARCHED IN YOUR DATA BASE.  PLEASE NOTIFY ME IN REGARD TO THIS PROBLEM.
